ruleset.name: TIA Strict
ruleset.description: The TIA Strict ruleset is based on the PLSQL Developement standards on the wiki7.

rule.name: ProgramMustCallZProgramFirst
rule.message: Programs must call z_program as the first statement.
rule.description: z_program: Must be called in the beginning of each procedure/function and after each call to other procedure/function.
